entry.title: Contest Roadmap for 2024
entry.summary: Hello everyone! I am pleased to announce a whole bunch of events this year! The next major contest is coming up soon, but we are…
entry.content: Hello everyone! I am pleased to announce a whole bunch of events this year! The next major contest is coming up soon, but we are also preparing this year’s 72hr Jam, another TFConnect collaboration, the unofficial April Fools celebration, as well as the next season of Microcontests! Check our Site Calendar for the exact dates!

entry.title: New Jersey once again on fire
entry.summary: You may have noticed the forums acting up again. Vultr, our server provider, is once again fighting (and failing) its battle against its own infrastructure.
entry.content: You may have noticed the forums acting up again. Vultr, our server provider, is once again fighting (and failing) its battle against its own infrastructure. We will let you know once everything is working again.

entry.title: Staff Meeting on the 20th!
entry.summary: Hello mappers! We are starting 2024 with a team meet-up discussing our plans for the year. There are various projects coming up, some public, some…
entry.content: Hello mappers! We are starting 2024 with a team meet-up discussing our plans for the year. There are various projects coming up, some public, some not. You may have already seen Nesman’s improvements to our map queue (bot.tf2maps.net), which has been completely rewritten, as well as the discussions a few weeks ago about the Featured Maps event. There is a lot to talk about, but if there is anything that is especially close to your heart, let us know so we can add it to the agenda. We can’t promise we will talk about everything, but we will at the very least consider it. Cheers!

entry.title: Trying out this “blog post” feature
entry.summary: Ever since the TF2 Team rediscovered this ancient technology, we have been itching to try it out as well. Hello everyone! This is now the…
entry.content: Ever since the TF2 Team rediscovered this ancient technology, we have been itching to try it out as well. Hello everyone! This is now the TF2Maps Blog, where we will try to share whatever is currently happening behind the scenes. Cheers!
